__e: You made her wait a day and a half!
Yes. She's with me. He made her get off at Porta Nova.
Isn't that why you allowed Captain Janeway to come here?
Me, I know one that came to Moscow to a soccer game have seen one of those Italians.
And you, don't tell me you didn't see anything 'cause he saw it.
If you didn't see it then where did this robber come from?
Yeah, Dr. Nathan brought him back from the dead.
Then if you haven't done it yet, you will!
If he died because of her, who gave him one and a half million what did we do to him?
Why in the devil didn't he come to me with this or to you? Somebody?
Besides, if she did take the body and hasn't told me, it's because she doesn't trust me, either.
